name: usfm-tools
description: Scripts and utilities for transforming and preparing US* schemas for use in Platform.Bible and Paratext

scripts.bash-generate-3.0.7-map: npm run generate-markers-map -- --schema src/test-data/usx-3.0.7.rng --version 3.0.7 --commit 6c490bb5675d281b0fa01876fe67f6e3fd50a4ce --outJSON src/test-data/markers-3.0.7.json > src/test-data/stdout-3.0.7.txt
scripts.bash-generate-3.1-map: npm run generate-markers-map -- --schema src/usx-3.1.rng --version 3.1 --commit 50f2a6ac3fc1d867d906df28bc00fcff729a7b76 --outJSON src/markers-3.1.json > src/test-data/stdout-3.1.txt
scripts.bash-generate-test-maps: npm run bash-generate-3.0.7-map && npm run bash-generate-3.1-map
